body.raw:
The vectr Curator is an AI-powered system that aggregates, analyzes, and curates the latest cryptocurrency news from trusted sources across the web.

Our mission is to provide timely, accurate, and insightful crypto news coverage, helping readers stay informed about the rapidly evolving digital asset landscape.

All articles are sourced from reputable crypto news outlets and processed to ensure high-quality, relevant content for our readers.

document.title: Bitcoin whales send BTC price under $109.5K as market ‘wobbles’ into US PCE
document.summary: Crypto traders are noticing familiar patterns in Bitcoin whale behavior this week, just in time for the release of US inflation data. Keep an eye on the market

body.raw:
![ Bitcoin whales send BTC price under $109.5K as market ‘wobbles’ into US PCE ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjQtMTIvMDE5MzhlZjUtOTA2Yi03ZmI1LTgwYjktNTk1NzNmZjJiY2Mw.jpg)

document.title: Ethereum onchain volume tops $320 billion in August, highest since mid-2021
document.summary: In August, Ethereum saw a significant spike in onchain volume, surpassing $320 billion. This surge was driven by increased institutional interest and low transa

body.raw:
![Ethereum onchain volume tops $320 billion in August, highest since mid-2021](https://www.tbstat.com/wp/uploads/2020/04/20200423_Ethereum_Stateless-1x-Daily-800x450.jpg)

In August, Ethereum saw a significant spike in onchain volume, surpassing $320 billion. This surge was driven by increased institutional interest and low transaction fees. This marks Ethereum's highest monthly volume since 2021.

document.title: Tether leads as crypto borrowing soars to $44 billion in record quarter
document.summary: Crypto borrowing surged in Q2 2025, hitting a record $26.47 billion backed by digital assets on DeFi platforms. Galaxy Research revealed a 42.1% increase from t

body.raw:
![Tether leads as crypto borrowing soars to $44 billion in record quarter](https://cryptoslate.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/tether-loan.jpg)

Crypto borrowing surged in Q2 2025, hitting a record $26.47 billion backed by digital assets on DeFi platforms. Galaxy Research revealed a 42.1% increase from the previous quarter. This trend highlights the growing popularity of leveraging crypto holdings for loans in the market.

document.title: Bunni DEX paused following $2.4M exploit of liquidity function
document.summary: An exploit in Bunni's liquidity system led to a $2.4 million loss in stablecoins. To prevent further losses, the platform has temporarily halted all contracts.

body.raw:
![ Bunni DEX paused following $2.4M exploit of liquidity function ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjUtMDEvMDE5NDZlMzUtZDkzZC03MzYxLTg2YjctMDMyZWNiNGEzZTFk.jpg)
